content:
Posted: November 17, 2016
Early Access Review
								Game has some serious bugs. You hook the 'treasure chest' and you have to release it because you can't open it. There are 'creatures' and there is no freeplay. Slog through each and every fishing spot till you mercifully just turn off the game. Additionally there isloud  rude commentary from the 'fisherman' when you catch a fish. Broken rods, props tackle, all too common with very little start up money. Too many snags extremely loud noises. It isn't even close to what fishing is. It's not peaceful, and it isn't fun. I played for nearly two hours offline and grew so frustrated I decided it has to go.Refunded. 2/10

Is a nice game for all publics.I recommend this game to all users, and openly congratulate the team Thirsten Studios.
